operations.summary: Publish an entity or set of entities or Preview
operations.notes:
Publish an entity immediately.

This is an asynchronous call that returns a success when the publish has started for an entity that has been published immediately

When specifying the workflowType, the workflow must match. I.e. you cannot set workflowType to publish and use the publicationId field, since it is only available to preview workflowType. See below for the complete one-to-one associations:
workflowTypeworkflow
publishentities
unpublishentities
layoutentities
unpublishLayoutentities
previewpublicationId
publishCollectioncollectionUrl


General usage notes:

- One can only publish the latest version of an entity
- One must always specify the version of the entity being published

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
{
"workflowType": {
"type": "string",
"required": true,
"description": specifies the type of workflow
}
"entities" : {
"type": Array of strings of the format /publication/{publicationId}/{entityType}/{entityName};version={entity-version},
"required": false,
"description": Array of relative paths of entities to process - only applies to workflowTypes publish, unpublish, layout and unpublishLayout
}
publicationId " : {
"type": String,
"required": false,
"description": The GUID that represents the publication - only applies to workflowType preview
}
collectionUrl " : {
"type": String,
"required": false,
"description": The relative path of the collection that needs to be published - only applies to workflowType publishCollection
}
}

responseMessages.message: Successfully started or scheduled the job
Bad Request - one of the parameters in request body was invalid; more detail in the response body
Version conflict - specified version is not the latest
